attributes.action: make the jail term for peodophiles stricter and not a slap on the wrist
attributes.additional_details: in many cases they dont even get jail, just go a register here is a recent case and one of many you can just search on the internet yourself. http://www.ibtimes.co.uk/you-stop-being-child-12-self-named-paedophile-escapes-jail-despite-extreme-porn-stash-1603465
attributes.background: i want this in because a peodophile destroys a persons hole life and leaves them mentally damaged, while the peodophile gets a minimum sentence an is out re offending a short while later. Its a disgrace!
